modName: Him - The Man With No Name - ECE and RACEMENU preset
summary:
The preset of " Him", The Man With No Name
- Available for ECE and RACEMENU
- Tested with CMO and SKYSIGHT SKINS and vanilla skins
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][center][img width=801,height=248]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/79540-0-1476787967.jpg[/img][/center]

         --------------------------------Quality follower version by Triptherift [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79613/?]HERE[/url] ----------------------------------[/size]
[size=4][size=4][size=3]--------------------------My exclusive blog (showcase armors/screenarchery tricks/requests) [url=https://skyrimscandal.blogspot.fr/]HERE[/url] ------------------------
-----------------------------------------------------------My flickr [url=https://www.flickr.com/photos/140099146@N03/]HERE[/url] ---------------------------------------------------------[/size][/size]

[center]Him aka "The Man With No Name" is one of my latest creation.
I wanted to create a good looking male character with personnality.
He is a nord. He is confident, nonchalant and seducer.
I hope you like....him  :)[/center][/size][size=4]         [img width=834,height=487]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/79540-0-1476778375.jpg[/img]

His face is available for [color=#ff7700]ECE[/color] and [color=#ff7700]RACEMENU[/color]. It's a face preset. I created "Him" first in ECE, then converted in RACEMENU by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/28059195/?]TRIPTHERIFT [/url]( Sassy teen girls/ legend of 1001 nights/ The goddess Diana/etc...)

Before loading the preset, you need important mods. These mods are generally HD textures to improve details of the face. Some mods are only for men, others are for both gender.

Please, install this list of mods:

[/size][list]
[*][size=4]His brows : [color=#ff7700]TRUE BROWS[/color] 1.7 [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50307/?]HERE[/url]  (Standalone mod)[/size]
[/list][size=4]                 He uses "[/size][size=4]malebrow_22.dds" and "[/size][size=4]MaleBrow1_n.dds"

[/size][list]
[*][size=4]His beard : [color=#ff7700]BEARDS[/color] 2.0 [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28363/?]HERE[/url] (Standalone mod)[/size]
[/list][size=4]                 He uses [/size][size=4]"BeardShort06.dds" and "[/size][size=4]BeardShort06_n.dds"

[/size][list]
[*][size=4]His eyes : [color=#ff7700]CUTE EYES[/color] 1.2 [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13076/?]HERE[/url] ( replacer "vanilla)[/size]
[/list][size=4]               He uses "[/size][size=4]EyeGrey.dds" and "[/size][size=4]EyeBrown_n.dds"
               You can use other eyes if you want. Cute eyes is not a high requirement

[/size][list]
[*][size=4]His hairs : [color=#ff7700]KS HAIRDOS RENEWAL[/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]HERE[/url] (Standalone mod)[/size]
[/list][size=4]                He uses the "chain reaction " haircut. "[/size][size=4]chain reaction.dds" and "[/size][size=4]chain reaction_n.dds"

[/size][list]
[*][size=4]His [color=#ff7700]warpaint[/color] comes from the excellent modder [color=#ff7700]MISUZU[/color]. Misuzu's warpaints are free to use. I credit him for his fantastic work as he wish.[/size]
[/list][size=4]                Install the whole mod "MSZ WARPAINT" part 1,2,3 and 4  [url=http://msz-misuzu.jimdo.com/msz-skyrim-mods/warpaints/]HERE[/url]
[/size]                     [color=#ff0000][size=4] [color=#00ff00]Note : MSZ WARPAINT is a warpaint mod without esp, it's a vanilla replacer...so make a back up of                   your old warpaint[/color][/size][/color][color=#00ff00].
[/color]  
[size=4]                For a warpaint in high resolution, do not forget these lines in your SKSE.ini[/size][size=4]
                [/size][size=4]SKSE.ini
                [Display]
                iTintTextureResolution=2048

[/size][list]
[*][size=4]"Him" has a big [color=#ff7700]scar[/color] on his face.It's a vanilla scar. Use your favorite scars retex.[/size]
[/list][size=4]                                                 
[/size]
[list]
[*][size=4]Maybe you notice that "Him" has 2 different [color=#ff7700]eye size[/color]...it's normal. I raised his left brow to break the face symmetry and to create a [color=#ff7700]mischievous attitude[/color].[/size]                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             _____________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[/list][size=4]                                                                                                 
[font=Georgia][color=#ff7700][size=6]                                                  "Him" Skin
[color=#ffffff]                 [size=4]  _________________________________________________________[/size][/color]
[/size][/color][/font]

Basically, "Him" works with all available male skin textures.....even vanilla textures. But i highly recommend you an HD retexture of the face/body.
I recommend you CMO [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54568/?]HERE[/url] [size=6][u]or[/u][/size] SKYSIGHT SKINS [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58443/?]HERE[/url] ...not both at the same time. They are not compatible because they use different bodyshape.
The choice is yours...choose your favorite.

My opinion:
"Him" has been originaly created with CMO. His face has good result with CMO. Skysight skins have good results too, but his original personnality "lose something", so...make your choice.
I made screenshots for comparison. For you, it will be easier to choose.


              [font=Georgia] [b][i]  [color=#ff7700]  [/color][/i][color=#fce5cd][color=#ff7700] " HIM " with CMO    [/color]                                               [color=#ff7700]  " HIM " with SKYSIGHT SKINS[/color][/color][/b][/font]

[img width=409,height=538]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/79540-0-1476786116.jpg[/img]    [img width=404,height=539]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/79540-1-1476786115.jpg[/img]

                                               ____________________________________     
                                         [/size][size=4][center][font=Georgia][color=#ff7700][size=6]      Installation           
[/size][/color][/font][/center][/size][size=4]                                               ____________________________________

[/size][size=4][size=4]Before loading the preset, i recommand you to select the[u] Male Nord Race[/u].
I recommend to do a manual installation.
[/size]                                                                                                 
[/size][list]
[*][size=4][size=4]If you use [color=#b6d7a8]Enhance Characters Edit[/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/?]HERE[/url][/size][/size]
[/list][size=4][size=4]
Download only " Him ECE preset "
Extract the file in myDocuments/My Games/Skyrim/CME_save
In the game, enter the racemenu (consol command " showracemenu ")
Search for the slider "slot load" and load "slot 38"
      "Him"  appears!


[/size][/size][list]
[*][size=4][size=4]If you use [color=#b6d7a8]racemenu[/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]HERE[/url][/size][/size]
[/list][size=4][size=4]
Download only " Him RACEMENU preset "
Extract the file in data/skse/plugins/chargen/presets
In game, go into showracemenu,
Select the one called "Him.jslot" and hit enter.
"Him" appears ![/size]       

                                          ______________________________________________
[color=#ff7700][size=5]                                          
                                          Recommendations:[/size][/color]
